hiveArticle.title: Cooking After Long Time - Vegan Vermicilli
hiveArticle.body:
Today after a long time I have spent time in the kitchen cook ing Vegan Vermicelli. I am a vegetarian thus I have limited option but still once in a while we try something new. Vermicelli is like a pasta but it's a slim thread.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/jc6b3kamx5.jpg)

In the packet it said roast before use but you can also boil it just like noodles, this is how I made it. I have boiled around 2 cups of vermicelli and then added two spoons of oil in it so that it should not stick together. 

After done I have cut some veggies like beans, carrot, onion and potato. 

![image](https://img.esteem.ws/rvanw3agaz.jpg)

Then I fried some onion in a pam using three tablespoon of oil.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/j1jlxpybqd.jpg)

After that I have added some veggies and close the lid to cook it for some time.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/bfascvncmu.jpg)

After some time added the vermicelli and some soy sauce and then it's ready.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/xttpl5en14.jpg) 

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/4bdu7bvrnt.jpg)

pageContext.title: Cooking After Long Time - Vegan Vermicilli
